name: SnowballTarget
description:
Custom ML-Agents environment for the Hugging Face Deep Reinforcement Learning Course: https://huggingface.co/deep-rl-course/unit0/introduction

You can load trained agents located in the Hugging Face Hub.

If you want to learn to train yours using Deep Reinforcement Learning, check: https://huggingface.co/deep-rl-course/unit5/introduction
